Method Detail

createTopicQuery

TopicQuery createTopicQuery()
Create a TopicQuery, with this query can search in Knowledge bases. The query parameters are set up with defaults values.

Returns:
the created query.

createFullTextQuery

FullTextQuery createFullTextQuery()
Create a FullTextQuery, with this query can search in FullText indexes. The query parameters are set up with defaults values.

Returns:
the created query.

searchTree

TopicTreeQueryResult searchTree(TopicQuery topicQuery)
Search in knowledge bases and the results are contained in tree format.

Parameters:
topicQuery - the specified query
Returns:
the query result

search

TopicListQueryResult search(TopicQuery topicQuery)
Search in knowledge bases and the results are contained in list format.

Parameters:
topicQuery - the specified query
Returns:
the query result

search

FullTextQueryResult search(FullTextQuery fullTextQuery)
Search in full text index.

Parameters:
fullTextQuery - the specified query
Returns:
the query result

search

FullTextQueryResult search(FullTextQuery fullTextQuery,
                           FullTextTopicQuery fullTextTopicQuery)
Search in full text index with topic extension.

Parameters:
fullTextQuery - the specified query
fullTextTopicQuery - the specified topic extension. It can be null.
Returns:
the query result

search

QueryResult search(TopicQuery topicQuery,
                   FullTextQuery fullTextQuery)
Search in knowledge bases and full text index. If topic query search has result it will be converted to FullTextTopicQuery and then use search(FullTextQuery, FullTextTopicQuery) method for full text search.

Parameters:
topicQuery - the specified topic query
fullTextQuery -
Returns:

Get spelling suggestion for the specified term.

Parameters:
term - the specified term
Returns:
the correct term or the input term if it's correct or doesn't have suggestion

indexKnowledgeBaseForSuggestion

void indexKnowledgeBaseForSuggestion(KnowledgeBase knowledgeBase)
Index knowledge base for suggestion. If knowledge base is uploaded then it is available for search with getSuggestions(String, int) method.

Parameters:
knowledgeBase - the knowledge bases will be indexed

getStem

Returns:
the stemmed word or if the word can not stem then the word.

the file type names

importKnowledgeBase

void importKnowledgeBase(String file,
                         String type,
                         KnowledgeBase knowledgeBase)
                         throws ImportException
Import knowledge base and start the knowledge base storing process.

Parameters:
file - the uploaded knowledge base file.
type - the uploaded file type.
knowledgeBase - the KnowledgeBase object which will contain the imported knowledge base.
Throws:
ImportException

the available scopes.

ImportException

filterImportedKnowledgeBase

void filterImportedKnowledgeBase(Collection<Long> scopesImportID)
                                 throws ImportException
Filter knowledge base is under importing. This is the second step of knowledge base storing process.

Parameters:
scopesImportID - the import id for that scopes which want to import. The other scopes will be dropped
Throws:
ImportException

getImportedRelationTypes

Collection<RelationType> getImportedRelationTypes()
                                                  throws ImportException
Get relation types from knowledge base is under importing.

Returns:
the relation types.
Throws:
ImportException

storeImportedKnowledgeBase

KnowledgeBase storeImportedKnowledgeBase(Collection<RelationTypeSetting> relationTypeSettings)
Store imported knowledge base. Before store it all relation types weight will be updated with specified values in the relationTypeSettings parameter.

Parameters:
relationTypeSettings - specified the weight of the relation types
Returns:

the collection of knowledge base descriptors

                         KnowledgeBaseDescriptor knowledgeBaseDescriptor)
Update relation types weights in the specified knowledge base.

Parameters:
relationType - this object contains the new weights
knowledgeBaseDescriptor - the specified knowledge base

getFilesFromKnowledgeBaseImportDirectory

Collection<File> getFilesFromKnowledgeBaseImportDirectory()
Get files from the specified import directory. This setting come from configuration XML.

Returns:
the files from directory

indexDocument

void indexDocument(boolean reindex,
                   int depth,
                   String dir,
                   String contentHandlerType)
Index documents under specified directory. The directory can be a single file then only it will be indexed.

Parameters:
reindex - if true update the stored document if it is existed
depth - specified the max directory depth
dir - specified the directory, it can be a single file
contentHandlerType - specified the content handler type

indexDocuments

void indexDocuments(String configPath,
                    String contentHandlerType)
Index documents like indexDocument(boolean, int, String, String) , but the parameters are in a configuration file.

Parameters:
configPath - the configuration file path
contentHandlerType - specified the content handler type

reReadConfig

void reReadConfig()
                  throws ConfigurationException
Read the configuration file again and refresh the managers.

Throws:
ConfigurationException
